overview:
Dave Weir was the CEO of SharesPost, and was responsible for the strategic direction and operations of the company. Prior to joining SharesPost, Dave enjoyed a career spanning more than 28 years as an investment banker and financial services business executive.

Dave began his career at J.P. Morgan & Co. where he was a Managing Director and played an important leadership role in the development and rapid growth of the J.P. Morganâ€™s investment banking business over a period of twenty years. He served in numerous capacities at J.P. Morgan including Co-Head of the firmâ€™s North American Technology and Telecommunications Investment Banking practice, Head of the Western United States Region, Chief Executive Officer of J.P. Morgan Canada and Head of Software Investment Banking.

During a several year hiatus from J.P. Morgan, Dave served as President and Chief Executive Officer of OffRoad Capital, the first online marketplace for private company investments. Most recently, Dave was the Founding Partner of Spring Creek Advisory Group, LLC, a firm that specializes in providing merger and acquisition advice and capital raising services to start up and expansion stage growth companies.
